channel.title: recover on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in recover on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mt3: recovery after big marble mishap
item.description: 09:51 Tuesday 12 December 2017 JST I added a record 7 seconds of video in just 2 hours. Part of that was certainly due to fewer disparate things going on, not the least of which being that the stage was stopped from turning! At this point: the cutter is just about to cut the excess support off the ramp base, after which the gluer will lift the base and glue the pieces to it.
